heading: Bangladesh Launches New Satellite
summary: Bangladesh successfully launched its second communication satellite, expanding its presence in the space industry and boosting national telecom capabilities.

heading: Heavy Rain Causes Flood in Northern Region
summary: Continuous rainfall has led to flooding in several northern districts. Relief operations are underway, and citizens are advised to remain cautious.

heading: Dhaka Metro Rail Adds New Stations
summary: Dhaka Metro Rail now includes three new stations, reducing commute time for thousands of passengers and easing city traffic congestion.

heading: Bangladeshi Students Win Global Robotics Contest
summary: A team of students from Bangladesh earned first place in an international robotics competition held in Japan, showcasing innovation and talent.

heading: Fuel Prices Adjusted by Government
summary: The government has announced a new pricing policy for fuel, with slight reductions aiming to stabilize market inflation and aid transportation sectors.

heading: National Budget 2025-26 Announced
summary: The Finance Minister unveiled the national budget for 2025-26, focusing on education, healthcare, and digital transformation initiatives.

heading: Electric Buses Launched in Dhaka
summary: To promote green transportation, the government launched electric buses on key Dhaka routes, aiming to reduce pollution and traffic costs.

heading: University Admission Tests Start Nationwide
summary: Public universities across the country began their entrance exams for the academic year 2025-26 with over 500,000 students participating.
